fullplot: Scientists at an Arctic research station discover a spacecraft buried in the ice. Upon closer examination, they discover the frozen pilot. All hell breaks loose when they take him back to their station and he is accidentally thawed out!
plot: Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a blood-thirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.
title: The Thing from Another World

tomatoes.consensus: As flying saucer movies go, The Thing From Another World is better than most, thanks to well-drawn characters and concise, tense plotting.

writers: John W. Campbell Jr. (based on the story "Who Goes There?" by)
